Accommodation at The Royal Pines Resort by The Hotels, Motels Accommodation Assoc for the purpose of attending there Awards Night.
Attended the Emirates Melbourne Cup as a guest of Emirates Airline in capacity as Shadow Minister for Tourism.
Provided with tourism industry rates and/or room upgrades and/or club lounge access and/or complimentary meeting room facilities

disclosures.entity: Star City Hotel and Apartments, Sydney
disclosures.details: Provided with tourism industry rates and/or room upgrades and/or club lounge access and/or complimentary meeting room facilities
Provided with tourism industry rates and/or room upgrades and/or club lounge access and/or complimentary meeting room facilities
Provided with tourism industry rates and/or room upgrades and/or club lounge access and/or complimentary meeting room facilities
Accepted invitation to attend and address the 2010 APEC SME Conference in Yibin, Sichuan, China and lead a delegation visit to Chendu, Chongqing, Beijing, Guangzhou, China as a guest.
Purchased an Albemarle 305 boat to which I now hold title.
The boat was financed by mortgage.

Attended the re-opening of Hayman Island at a special hosting of The Chef's Table with Industry Representatives and to inspect the refurbishment of the resort following the impact of cyclone damage; hospitality provided including overnight accommodation, dinner, breakfast and return launch transfers; accompanied by wife on trip

Travelled to Taiwan as a part of a delegation between the 12 & 17 December as a guest of the PRC Taiwan as Deputy Chair of the Australia - Taiwan Parliamentary Friendship Group. The PRC Taiwan provided all Airfares, Accommodation & Hospitality during the trip. Accompanied by wife.
Travelled to Israel between the 28th January to 4th February 2012 as a guest of the Australian Israel Jewish Affairs Council (AIJAC). All airfares, accommodation and meals were provided by AIJAC.

Tourism website & video, Staycation.org.au and a Facebook page, We Love Oz; The project was not funded from any electorate resources or entitlements; That Qantas provided (1) airfare for the film crew from Unseen Productions from Sydney to Canberra and Cairns; That the Shangril La Hotel, Cairns provided (1 night, 1 room) accommodation for the film crew from Unseen Productions; That Tribecount provided the 'We Love Oz' Facebook Page Development at no cost; That de Groots Media provided the 'Staycation.org.au' website development at no cost; That any commercial aspect related to the Staycation website is run by AboutAustralia.com at arms length and with no financial return to me whatsoever.
Attended the Premier of Legally Blonde at the Lyric Theatre. 2 tickets were provided by the NSW AHA
Attended NRL Grand Final; 2 tickets & hospitality provided.
Received 20 cartons of Beer for tourism hospitality functions in my office
Receive a continuing Foxtel subscription at Electoral Office, Raymond Terrace.
No longer have a Motor Vehicle Lease
No longer hold an ANZ Visa Card
Have a Commonwealth Bank Mastercard
Provided complimentary membership for my wife and I.
Between the 19 - 21st November 2012 I was a guest of Phil Webster (AHA) on board his boat 'MV Little Audrey' at Cairns.
The vessel was chartered by the AHA and had members of the AHA present during the trip.

Undertook a trip with Phil Webster on MV Little Audrey on the Barrier Reef, Cairns between 13 - 18 November had the fuel paid for by the AHA; Had no knowledge that AHA were sponsoring the fuel for the trip until recently.
On the 22nd & 23rd April I travelled as a guest of Hancock Prospecting from Brisbane to Newman, then onto Roy Hill & Perth.
Accommodation and meals were provided at the Roy Hill Mining Camp.
The purpose of the trip was to attend the opening of the Hope Downs 4 Iron Ore Mine and inspect the Roy Hill Mine Project.
On Saturday, 6 April I attended the 2013 Tooheys New Golden Slipper, Rosehill as a guest of Lion Nathan.

On Wednesday, 17th April I participated in a tourism product familiarisation, including helicopter and watercraft charters, in Darwin as a guest of the Australian Hotels Association National Executive
The proceeds of a fundraising auction held at a dinner of my supporters on 26th March 2013 in Sydney were directed to the Liberal Party of Australia
Auctioned Items to the Liberal Party.

I have received complimentary membership to The Club from Virgin Australia

I joined the Liberal National Party candidate for Fisher, Mal Brough, in inspecting the key Sunshine Coast tourism and infrastructure assets by air. This 1.6 hour helicopter ride was provided free of charge by Becker Helicopters Pty Ltd.
